title: WebSocket rework

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description

WebSocket support needs some love:

- `onMessage` must be run on a duplicated context (#32801)
- Development model improvements such as:

    - Allows onMessage to return something that will automatically serialized to the web socket (single point of broadcast)
    - Automatically mapped the message into an object
    - Handle serialization/deserialization (text and binary)
    - Support blocking and non-blocking (Uni)
